name: Arclight Cascade
description: In the Arclight Arena, you fend off Glass Drones and other Player Pilots by swiping and slashing them away in glorious 4-way Sabre clashing combat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or AMD Radeon HD 3830 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or AMD FX 4.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Nice casual arcade game. Kinda like Asteroids with a sword and you gotta hit things into a certain area. Just move around and swing your mouse like crazy. So much satisfaction when you get the Grow powerup and hit everything with one swing :) If you're mad, great stress reliever. You can also change the speed Problems naming first player, too many extra letters to choose from.
